thread.title: -Kip
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by -Kip

author: -Kip
title: -Kip
text:
They bent over backwards to help me correct a problem that I created. Carlos personally went to the production department and pulled my product before it was sent to print, so that I could correct an error. After all that, I still received my notepads by the original deadline that was Quote: d.
Couldn't be happier and my notepads are professional quality.
Thanks again for all your help!
